column4: What is the SIMPLEST way to format a drive?  I want to wipe 100% of the usable drive.  I don't need it to be super secure, I just want to wipe and start over.
I want to load up ubuntu with xfce... if that matters
Anyone use dban?  I need to wipe my drive so I can install ubuntu
When your on the Live CD?
Ok so there are currently partitions on it?
and you want to get rid of all of these partitions?
yes, i want to wipe 100% of the drive.  I don't need to over write the drive 5 times or anything, I just want to start fresh.   with 100% of the drive.
maybe booting up the Live CD again will help
also there's a Gparted Live CD
How much RAM do you have?
some say  SWAP is only really needed for hibernation these days,  as long as got like 1GB or more RAM,    others say still needed even with 4GB RAM,  basicalley
if you got a big enough USB stick you can also run a persistent install from that
